ability.Frost Armor: This Pokemon forms an ice armor that reduces damage from non-Fire-type attacks by 20%. Additionally, the ice armor has a 30% chance to freeze any Pokemon that makes contact.
ability.Chilled Circulation: At the end of turn using an Ice-type move, boost its Speed by one stage.

Glacial Claws.effect: Has a 20% chance to freeze the target. Always results in a critical hit.

Close Combat.effect: Lowers the user's Defense and Special Defense by 1 stage.

Swords Dance.effect: Raises the user's Attack by 2 stages.
